explanation: Leverages the VBScript entry into MSHTML via rundll32 to proxy into a hidden PowerShell stager. The proxy relies on trusted components, aiding control bypass.
rationale_steps: From PowerShell, call rundll32 to run MSHTML via VBScript handler.
Use WScript.Shell to start a hidden PowerShell process that downloads and executes a remote script.
Abuses trusted binaries for proxy execution; defenders should flag VBScript/MSHTML exports paired with network pulls.
